Private Events at Jackson House

At Jackson House, we believe gatherings should feel personal, memorable, and effortless. Whether you're celebrating a milestone, hosting colleagues, or planning an elevated evening, our spaces and hospitality team are here to make it special.

Private Gatherings

Best For: Birthdays, business dinners, and social gatherings that want a private touch within regular service hours.

Location + Capacity

  • Indoor Dining Room - up to 30 guests
  • Patio - up to 40 guests

Highlights

  • Dedicated hospitality team member(s)
  • 2.5 hour reservation window
  • Full access to our seasonal dining menus

Pricing

  • No room rental fees
  • $65 per guest minimum
  • $1000 total event minimum

Notes

  • One check per group
  • Pricing does not reflect tax + gratuity
  • For larger or customized experiences, see our Curated Events
Inquire Now

Curated Gatherings

Best For: Chef-driven, elevated formats designed for memorable evenings - from refined multi-course dinners to lively social experiences.

Location + Capacity

  • Indoor Dining Room - up to 30 guests
  • Patio - up to 40 guests
  • Entire Restaurant - up to 100 guests

Highlights

  • Chef-curated, fully customized menu
  • Dedicated event planning support
  • Dedicated hospitality team members

Pricing

  • Plated + Coursed - $125-$175 per guest (refined multi-course seated dinner)
  • Social + Shareables - starting at $105 per guest (reception-style gathering featuring chef creations)
  • Indoor Dining Minimum - $2000 min.
  • Patio - $2000 min.
  • Full Buyout Wednesday - $3,000 min.
  • Full Buyout Thu + Sun - $3,500 min.
  • Full Buyout Fri + Sat - $7,500 min.
Inquire Now
